p: (3β,5α,8α, 22E,24S)-Epidioxy-24-methylcholesta-6,22,25-trien-3-ol called axinysterol ( 22), (3β,5α,8α,24 R)-Epidioxy-24-methylcholest-6-en-3-ol ( 23) and (3β,5α,8α,22 E,24 R)-Epidioxystigmasta-6,22-dien-3-ol ( 24) were detected in MeOH extract of the marine sponge Luffariella cf. variabilis [ 85].
